mapper.select: select product_info.*, concat_ws('-', category_info.category_name, parent.category_name) full_category_name from product_info join category_info on product_info.category_id = category_info.category_id join category_info parent on category_info.parent_id = parent.category_id where product_info.product_id = #{productId} and uid = #{uid} -- 过滤已删除商品信息 and status != ${@neko.transaction.commonbase.utils.entity.ProductStatus@DELETED}
